text: aur yah ki "apane rab se kshama maango, phir usakee or palat aao. vah tumhen ek nishchit avadhi tak sukhopabhog kee uttam saamagree pradaan karega. aur badh-badhakar karm karanevaalon par vah tadadhik apana anugrah karega, kintu yadi tum munh pherate ho to nishchay hee mujhe tumhaare vishay mein ek bade din kee yaatana ka bhay hai
